oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Howard Chapel AME: Cox Funeral Home
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Howard Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church
Color photograph of Cox Funeral Home, a brick house, near Howard Chapel AME Church.

Howard Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church is located in the small town of Huntingdon. It is adjacent to Golden Eagle Lodge 110, a Masonic lodge, and Third Avenue Baptist Church. At the time of fieldwork, it was noted that Howard Chapel AME resembled a school or lodge. Since the 1998 fieldwork, the building has acquired both a gable-roofed vestibule and rear addition. It also features a "Faith Deliverance Ministeries"sign above the doorway.
